contents:
我也来献丑写个：


Dear (学生会名字)


As you may know, recently the police broke into the campus of Hong Kong Polytechnic University and arrested many students. Dozens of students were injured. Doctors and first-aiders were not allowed to help the injured students and even got arrested (https://twitter.com/joshuawongcf/status/1196396815727284224). Until now, more than 100 students are still being trapped in the campus without food and water.


Being shocked by the violence in the campus, AStA TU Berlin has sent an letter to all TU Berlin students and call for solidarity( https://www.facebook.com/astatuberlin/posts/2930301143670191) with Hong Kong students. The university should be a place for studying and keeping the students safe. I hope you could stand with Hong Kong students as well.


PLEASE STAND WITH HONG KONG STUDENTS. PLEASE SHOW SOLIDARITY WITH HONG KONG STUDENTS.


Sincerely,


Someone who cares about Hong Kong students and human Rights.
